[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”34deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#fff9e2 0%|rgba(45,29,4,0) 85%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#fff9e2″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(45,29,4,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”85%” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/castlerigg-stones-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”13vw||13vw||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#44393d” header_font_size=”80px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#6b0906″ header_2_font_size=”74px” background_layout=”dark” header_font_size_tablet=”70px” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

COURTING THE WORLD SOUL

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#44393d” text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#44393d” header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Learn the fundamentals of working with the mythic imagination

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”About Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”48px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ custom_padding=”|14%|2%|14%|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|3%||3%|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Courting the World Soul

A foundation course for cultivating the mythic imagination

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” width=”68%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” text_font_size_tablet=”22px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This formerly interactive course is now available as an ongoing self-study, ‘on demand’ option.

– learn the fundamentals of working with the mythic imagination

– learn practical techniques to create a grounded, embodied practice for courting the anima mundi, the world soul of ancient tradition

– uncover the mythic themes and archetypes which are active in your life

– understand your own individual mythopoetic journey through this life, and the unique gift you bring to this world, at this time

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” width=”68%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”80px|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘The course was magic. I’m not even sure how to put into words how impactful it was. How do you explain a course that alters your entire perception of the world and fundamentally changes how you view your life? Thank you so much, Sharon! I loved this course so very much my heart could explode.’

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ width=”68%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”4px|||||” custom_padding=”|7%||7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SADIE, United States

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”About Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#893e39″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_3_font_size_phone=”20px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Learn a wide range of practical techniques for working with images to create a grounded, embodied practice for courting the world soul including :

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”20px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

– My unique adaptation of Jung’s active imagination technique, as seen in The Red Book
– Dreamwork
– Creative practices (art, writing, journaling)
– Embodied practices (cultivating the imaginal with all the senses)
– Land-based practices: learning how to work stories and images from your ancestral traditions, and bring them back home to the place where your feet are planted now

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Mountain-hare-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”4%|5%|4%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”30%||30%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”About Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#893e39″ background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Mute-swan-crop-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”22%|5%|22%|5%|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” header_3_font_size_tablet=”26px” header_3_font_size_phone=”20px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Learn how to experience life mythically :

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

– Create a map of your own unique mythopoetic journey through this life, and of the forces at work in your own psyche

– Work on your own personal mythology, exploring the archetypal situations which are active in your life, and learning how to analyse and cultivate the images and archetypes in myths and fairy tales

– Explore your soul’s calling, and the unique gift which you bring to the world

– Develop a working knowledge of, and solid grounding in, key Western spiritual/ mystery traditions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.net/the-mythic-imagination-2/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Click Here TO READ MORE ON THE MYTHIC IMAGINATION” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”16px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#893e39″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#893e39″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_letter_spacing=”0px” button_font=”Quattrocento Sans|||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”26px||||false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#2a2e2b” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Module  by  Module

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” width=”100%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE ONE” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/sun-over-mountain-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

– What is the world soul, and why should we engage with it?

– Cultivating the image.

– The Western mystery tradition: what is it, where did it come from, and is it relevant to our work today?

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE TWO” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/samhain-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dreamwork and dream-tending: how to work with the images which appear in our dreams, and engage with the wisdom they offer us.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE THREE” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/stream-at-beltaine-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Finding ourselves in fairy tales (a detailed dive into fairy tale imagery, motifs, themes and archetypes).

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE FOUR” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/stone-the-crow-crop.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

– What is myth, and why does it matter?

– Living mythically: how to recognise the myth you’re living and the archetypes that are active in your life.

– Personal mythmaking: how to write your own life story as a myth.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE FIVE” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/barn-SQ-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Hero/Heroine’s Journey: how can myth and the imaginal help us to map our journey through life, and through specific life passages?

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE SIX” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Iceland-glacier-lagoon-SD-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Navigating the other-than-human: how myths, fairy tales and folk tales teach us to negotiate with the wild (inner and outer); how they shed light on kinship, what it is to be human, and what it might mean to be ‘other’.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE SEVEN” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Brigid-square.jpg” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

– Place as a map of the self: the archetypes of place, and the ways in which place informs who we are.

– Mapping the songlines and place-lines of our lives.

– Mapping the stories of place.

 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”MODULE EIGHT” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/hollies-rockcrop.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Calling: discovering and then exploring the unique gift which you bring to the world, and the soul-image you’ve always carried within you.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”80px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘I wish to acknowledge, Sharon, the generosity of spirit, creative insight and clarity that you bring to your synthesis of mythology studies, depth psychology and ecology. It is no small thing to communicate complex subject matter in a manner that is readable and engaging, but you have consistently done so with each module in this course. You’ve created a valuable set of resources for your participants that enable and empower learning and personal growth. For this I thank you wholeheartedly.’

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”10px|||||” custom_padding=”0px|7%||7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SIMONE, NEW ZEALAND

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘The course has been remarkable. It has not mattered that I had read very little of the material you refer to as sources. I know very few myths – have little experience of ‘depth psychology’. Yet – I have engaged with the workbooks and the webinars and have found more than enough to fill my heart and head to capacity. I am meeting the imaginal in the day to day and I feel confident to grow that relationship. The shape of the course offers clear structure, holds clear boundaries, and offers ambitious content. Its form has arisen out of years of study and life experience. There is heart in it alongside academic rigour.’

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”10px|7%||7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FRANCES, UK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

HOW IT WORKS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_orientation=”justified” global_colors_info=”{}”]

All of my work is grounded in a firm commitment to ongoing academic and professional training in the fields of psychology (with a focus on narrative, depth and transpersonal psychology) and mythology, as well as in my longstanding personal practice, and exploration of the native traditions of the British Isles and Ireland. Please check out my academic and professional qualifications here.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_4_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”23px” header_4_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Workbooks

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_orientation=”justified” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You’ll be able to download a written workbook for each of the eight Modules. Workbooks include background subject matter, and practical exercises and creative tools to help you work through the material, and integrate the key practices into your own daily life.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_4_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”23px” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” custom_padding=”3%||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Webinars

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_orientation=”justified” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You’ll be able to watch the recordings of eight live teaching sessions, during which Sharon talks about each Module’s subject matter, and then takes questions from participants. (These webinars formed part of the original, interactive version of this course and were recorded from October to December 2019.)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_4_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”23px” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” custom_padding=”3%||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Audio recording

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_orientation=”justified” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You’ll be able to download an audio recording, to guide you through Sharon’s unique version of Jung’s active imagination technique.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#893e39″ header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”30px||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ENROL FOR THE COURSE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_text_color=”#282723″ text_line_height=”1.6em” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

This self-study, on-demand course is priced at £100. (For those of you in other countries: currency exchange rates change by the hour, and so we’re not able to tell you what the cost of this course is in your currency. This currency converter offers you live rates, though they may or may not reflect the rates actually given to you by your bank or credit card provider. It will, however, give you an indication.

When you sign up to Courting the World Soul, you’ll be prompted to create a login which will allow you access to the ‘Members area’ section of my website (top menu bar).  You’ll find your course material in the dropdown menu there, and clicking on the link will take you to your course material which you can work through at your own pace. IF YOU ALREADY HAVE AN ACCOUNT ON THIS SITE, YOU MUST USE THE SAME EMAIL ADDRESS AND USERNAME THAT YOU’RE ALREADY REGISTERED WITH, IN ORDER TO SEE ALL YOUR COURSES UNDER THE SAME MENU.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you have a discount code, you must enter it by clicking on the ‘Have a coupon’ link above the ‘Select payment method’ section below, before completing your payment.  We cannot apply discount codes after the event, or create partial refunds in the case of errors.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

First Name Required
Last Name Required
Invalid Username
Invalid Email
Invalid Password
Password Confirmation Doesn't Match
Password Strength  Password must be "Medium" or stronger
Have a coupon?
Invalid Coupon Coupon applied successfully
 
Please fix the errors above
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

*  Please agree to the course Terms & Conditions to continue

Please note in particular, before purchasing, that no refunds can be given for this course.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: A unique online course focused on cultivating the mythic imagination, grounded in Jungian depth psychology and transpersonal psychology.
